price: 149. Loba: Allah nde azali na elembetele ya makasi, mpe soki alingaki nde akambaki bino banso.
arabic: قُلۡ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡحُجَّةُ ٱلۡبَٰلِغَةُۖ فَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul falillahi al-ḥujatu al-bālighatu falaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
